Are you able to watch this live, or only through livestream and hoyts?

The game will be broadcast live on www.twitch.tv/riotgamesoceania or broadcast live to certain HOYTS cinemas. If you mean can you attend the event in person, unfortunately no. The Split 1 Final is played at the Riot Games Oceania studio which doesn't have the facilities for a live audience. The Split 2 Final will be played in front of a live audience (as well as being on Twitch and HOYTS). That one can be attended in person in Brisbane (dates not announced yet).

Well I was thinking that Chiefs would win first 2 games then loss to second announcers think that LGC are gonna make another amazing comeback like they did in 2014 (I think it was) then Chief win game 4. But, that didn't happen and it went to game 5 where tbh I was a little scared for the Chiefs. But, I was pretty sure they would win, again.
